item.title: Hegseth announces censure and potential demotion of Sen. Mark Kelly
item.description: The Trump administration has targeted the Arizona Democrat, a retired Navy officer, over a video reminding U.S. troops they can disobey illegal orders...

item.title: Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles
item.description: Follow President Trump’s progress filling over 800 positions, among about 1,300 that require Senate confirmation, in this tracker from The Washington ...

item.title: Walz drops bid for reelection as Minn. governor while Klobuchar considers run
item.description: The former Democratic vice presidential nominee stepped aside amid a growing fraud probe.

item.title: Democrats look primed to win the House, but a wave might be harder
item.description: Gerrymandering and longer-term trends in polarization have left fewer competitive House seats in next year’s midterm elections.

item.title: Trump revives an old vision of American power, with global implications
item.description: Trump’s moves to assert U.S. dominance in the Western Hemisphere and pull back from Europe could embolden Russia and China.
